column4: silly i know, but i have lost the network manger icon up in the top right hand corner, how do i get it back?
right click on the menu bar, select add and choose the applet you want to add
haha, that was the password at the start of lesuire suit larry, anyway, network manager is not listed in those items, to add to the bar.
you do mean the icon whit the flashing screens? I have them under system & hardware section
